page.title: 09 Fashion in 1985.
page.content: Nowadays many clothes are in fashion such as ski pants, baggies, jackets, mini-skirts, jeans and summer tops. {Baggies} are loose trousers with zips on the knees. Canvas jackets are in the fashionable colours of red, yellow, white and blue. Mini-skirts have a hemline which is above the knee. Summer tops usually have thin shoulder straps and are made of cotton or nylon. Tight fitting {jeans} are very popular. They are made of a material called denim which is cotton based. Jeans are trousers with patch pockets at the front and back. The most fashionable {colours} for 1985 are grey, white, red, bright yellow, blue and black.
